text: The Pirate's Gold is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Pirateâ€™s GoldHelen Hollick. Pirates: Truth and Tales and stars George Gebhardt, Linda Arvidson, and Charles Inslee. ==Actors== * George Gebhardt as Young Wilkinson * Linda Arvidson as Mrs. Wilkinson * Charles Inslee as A Creditor (unconfirmed) * Arthur V.
